class.name: Mutex
class.description: A synchronization mutex (mutual exclusion). This is used to synchronize multiple [Thread]s, and is equivalent to a binary [Semaphore]. It guarantees that only one thread can ever acquire the lock at a time. A mutex can be used to protect a critical section; however, be careful to avoid deadlocks.

method.name: lock
method.description: Locks this [Mutex], blocks until it is unlocked by the current owner.

method.name: try_lock
method.description: Tries locking this [Mutex], but does not block. Returns [constant OK] on success, [constant ERR_BUSY] otherwise.

method.name: unlock
method.description: Unlocks this [Mutex], leaving it to other threads.
